answers.answer: It worked for me.  I had to be on metformin, but after only 2 weeks on metformin I conceived on the first ovulation using pre-seed
Thank you so much for sharing your story :) and you took metformin for ovulation and not to regulate your sugar for diabetes right?
Yes, Metformin is used to control and regulate ovulation too, and it's very effective, in my case, it was metformin, without any other pill. And by God's grace I'm 30 weeks gone..

Well I have metformin but to regulate my blood sugar since I have diabetes but I haven't got to the doc due to no incoming income, but I'm going to be taking it again with the help of my parents so would having diabetes effect my pregnancy?And thank you :)

A lot of women who have diabetes still get pregnant, and most of them carry the babies to term.. But there are certain guidelines you may need to adhere to, your doctor will explain everything in detail.. I suggest you let your practitioner know before getting pregnant..

question: So I want to hear your story :)Well my husband changed his mind so we will still TTC :) and we were thinking about getting pre~seed. And I want to know how many of you ladies have used it and did it work for you?Your story will help us in deciding on buying the product or just keep charting my BBT and OPT'sSSBD :)
title: pre~seed...
